attributes.action: Close all non-essential stores due to CoronaVirus and support them with pay!!!
attributes.additional_details: The CoronaVirus is at a critical point. The number of cases and deaths are rising faster than they have in many other countries and we need to act now. Boris Johnson has closed many public places but non-essential shops and shopping centres are still open. We need to close all non-essential stores to keep staff and customers safe and put less pressure on the amazing NHS!!
attributes.background:
Close all non-essential stores to keep staff and customers safe and reduce the strain on the NHS! 
Support companies in ensuring retail staff still get paid.

rejection.details:
Since you started this petition, the Government as closed non-essential shops. You can find more information here: https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/further-businesses-and-premises-to-close/further-businesses-and-premises-to-close-guidance

The Government has also announced measures to support staff furloughed due to Coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/claim-for-wages-through-the-coronavirus-job-retention-scheme

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:  

www.gov.uk/coronavirus 

https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

The Government has also created an online service to help you out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support 

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
